# Collaborate

## Funded positions

Any funded positions will be advertised on [Jobbnorge](https://www.jobbnorge.no/search/en?OrderBy=Published&Period=All&employer=724#1), on the [EECRG webpage](https://www.uib.no/en/rg/EECRG) and on twitter etc.

## Visitors

Visitors are welcome for a [research visit](https://www.uib.no/en/rg/EECRG/56976/visiting-lab).

## Interns

Some projects have paid [internship positions](https://www.uib.no/en/rg/EECRG/131653/want-be-intern), often for fieldwork during the summer.

## Project ideas

If you have ideas for a project and you think I would be a useful partner or supervisor, email me ([richard.telford@uib.no](mailto:richard.telford@uib.no)) to have a chat.
